snippet.title: Chameleon - DYH: Chapter 2 - Windows PC
snippet.description:
Release date: 28 Jun, 2023

Wishlist at: 
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2371960/Chameleon__DYH_Chapter_2/

Chapter Two of Chameleon - DYH continues Kai's journey to find his brother.
As Angie continues to investigate the infamous ''Silent Mourn'', Strom struggles to face his past.
Overwhelmed with feelings of sorrow and despair,
Strom remembers the fateful day when his eyes have changed.

The Chapter's choices and outcomes heavily rely on progress in the previous gameplay.
Introducing a new puzzle quest and a new story to explore.
